definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: He clearly has a lot of respect for Borges.
sentences.chinese: 他显然十分地尊重博尔赫斯。

sentences.english: Borges’s universe didn’t have the Internet as we know it.
sentences.chinese: 据我们所知，博尔赫斯当年的世界里还没有网络。

sentences.english: There Borges started to think that his father was her "client".
sentences.chinese: 而博尔赫斯以为他的父亲是那个窑姐儿的老恩主。
